Description:
Rare opportunity in Clayton South's hottest pocket
Situated on a quiet street in Clayton South's hottest pocket, this light, bright and eco-friendly three bedroom home offers the best of both worlds-unbeatable location, generous allotment and nature at your door step.
Relax to the sound of birdlife in the sunny and spacious backyard or walk just a few metres down the no-through road to enjoy the popular Namatjira Park-a serene and family friendly park with walking tracks, lakes, playground, BBQ areas and an abundance of wildlife.
Featuring a sun-filled and recently updated kitchen, large laundry, air-conditioned lounge room plus heating and cooling through-out, this property is charming and full of potential.
With enough space to renovate or redevelop (STCA) and easy access to Clayton Central, train, bus and schools, this property is a dream for home buyers and investors.
- 598sqm (approx.) allotment in sought-after Clayton South location
- Potential for multi-dwelling redevelopment (STCA)
- Next to popular Namatjira Park
- Walk to train, bus, shops and St Andrews Primary School
- Solar hot water system + Solar power system (3 Kilowatts)
- Evaporate cooling + HRV(Home Ventilation Systems)
- Short drive to Costco, DFO, Chadstone Shopping Centre
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.17simonstreetclaytonsouth.com
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Insights: 17 Simon Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Convenient Location!
Detached, space, style and single-level living combine in perfect harmony to offer a stylish low maintenance home thats tailor made for first homebuyers and astute investors.
Those looking for a passive investment opportunity will be buoyed by its updated nature and immense rental potential, while homebuyers wishing to call this place home will be impressed by its contemporary appeal and homely character.
Neat and tidy, it has everything you want and needs a minimum of fuss. All two bedrooms are big, bright. The modern family bathroom features a bath, shower and a separate laundry room, while a contemporary kitchen is sure to please with its maximum (and intelligent) use of space, ample, great floor plan. The low maintenance backyard achieved a flowing sense of space. 10 solar panels on the roof provide energy for a 3.5kw inverter to save your electricity bill. It is more valuable than those relying on traditional means of electricity and renters would pay more for solar!
Located within walking distance of Westall train station and close drive to IKEA shopping Centre, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Clayton Community Centre, parks, local schools and Clayton Shopping Centre.

Purchasers should make their own enquires and refer to the due diligence check-list provided by Consumer Affairs. Description:
Corner your opportunities
Great opportunity for investors & land buyers to buy this 504 sqm (Approx) block. In a location that is surrounded by amenities; only a short walk to Westall Primary School, Westall Secondary Collage & Westall Train Station. This block is only minutes away from The Homemaker Centre, Ikea, Monash Hospital, Monash Medical Centre, Dingley Bypass & many restaurants.
(This Sale is Subject to GST).

Description:
AN ORIGINAL HOME WITH DUAL OCCUPANCY POTENTIAL
On around 668sqm in a court right near Clayton South Primary School and Clarinda Shopping Centre, this largely original home gives its new owner the opportunity to renovate, modernize and add significant value with potential to add another unit in the backyard (subject to council approval).
With its classic brick façade giving it timeless appeal, the home features a generous lounge room with gas heater and a dining area adjoining the kitchen with upright oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms with built in wardrobes plus a family bathroom and a separate toilet.
Outside you find a semi-enclosed patio, a north-facing backyard and a double garage with plenty of room to park additional vehicles. And with the facilities of central Clayton also just minutes away, this is a home with truly broad appeal.
Insights: 4 Wannan Court, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
No Stamp duty for first home buyer
First home buyers or investors will be impressed by this spacious one bedroom apartment.
This apartment is approximately 100m from Westall Train Station and bus stops, walking distance to Westall Primary and Secondary Schools, local shops, parks and reserves. Easy access to Westall Road, Princess Hwy and just minutes driving to Springvale Shopping and Homemaker Centre, Clayton Centre and Monash Medical Centre, and under 4km from Monash University Clayton.
Approximately 57Sqm internally consisting of 1 bedrooms with BIRs, FES, kitchen with Bosch appliances, stone bench tops, Bosch dishwasher, open plan living, split system Air Con, and a 12 sqm balcony with a good outlook. Additional features include: electronic card access, security video intercom entry, storage cage and a basement carpark plus visitors' carpark. NBN FTTP 100mbps ready. Gas included in Body Corp.
Insights: 233/59 Autumn Tce, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 5 other 1 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
A MODERN TOWNHOUSE RIGHT NEAR CENTRAL CLAYTON - UNDER CONTRACT
Modern, well planned and with everything a busy young professional or investor could ask for, this 2 storey terrace townhouse offers low maintenance living in a location just minutes away from central Clayton's buses, shops, train station and medical district. Behind its contemporary façade you find a ground floor featuring 2 bedrooms, an ensuite and bathroom tiled in porcelain and a Euro style laundry. Upstairs you find a large lounge room (currently being used a a third bedroom), powder room and a kitchen with stone benches, stainless appliances, an included meals area and a tiled balcony. There's also 2 split system heater/air conditioners and a titled car space in the secure basement parking garage. For the astute investors/landlords, take advantage of rental guaranteed lease of $20,280.00 p.a. until 1/05/2018
FOR SALE
James Tan 0450-351-7 06 jamestan@melbourneC21.com.au
Insights: 7/26a Audsley Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
A PRISTINE HOME IN PEACEFUL SURROUNDINGS
In an era where people change homes every few years, its quiet amazing to find a home that was built 50 years ago and has been in the same caring hands ever since.
In the time they have kept this home in stunning condition where any potential purchaser could simply move in and find comfort, update it to suit your needs or rent it out with absolute ease.
If you are to take over this legacy home you will enjoy features including a generous lounge with built in hardwood wall units, a large meals area adjoining the pristine kitchen and an extended family room that is bathed in sunshine.
There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as a family bathroom, separate toilet and a large laundry. There are 2 gas heaters and an air conditioner for added comfort while outside you find a private back yard with lovely gardens and great car accommodation between the carport with remote roller door and the rear double garage with space in between for 2 additional vehicles. And with a position right near Namatjira and Bald Hill parks plus buses, Clayton South Primary School and shops at both Clarinda and central Clayton, this really is a tempting package.
Insights: 51 Ester Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Minutes walk of Clayton Central!
Only 8 years young, this private double storey townhouse is positioned at the rear of a well maintained block, moments from the bustling heart of Claytons shopping, dining & transport precinct. Opening up to a North facing open plan living zone with access to the light filled courtyard, a Caeser stone kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, separate laundry & a sought after downstairs master bedroom with ensuite & WIR. Move upstairs for 2 further bedrooms with fantastic built in storage, a central bathroom & separate toilet. Featuring ducted heating throughout, reverse cycle air-conditioner, remote single garage with additional carspace in front, garden storage & water tank. Whether you're searching for a first home, downsizing, or looking for an investment in an area brimming with amenities such as Monash Medical Centre & Monash University you can't go wrong with this golden opportunity!
For further information text Sydney to 0428 296 250
Insights: 7/11-13 Sydney Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
CLASSIC STYLE & MODERN CONVENIENCE IN ONE PACKAGE - UNDER CONTRACT
If you want the convenience and easy lifestyle offers by a unit but find that many modern units a bit bland and lacking character, then this warm and inviting street front weatherboard home on a subdivided block might be ideal. Less than 10 minutes walk from train stations and central Clayton's facilities, a great position is only the beginning. Fronted by a steel fence and its timeless façade, this home features high ceilings, a central hallway, a generous lounge room and a meals area adjoining the pristine kitchen with corner pantry and stainless appliances including an oven and cook top. There are 2 large bedrooms including one with built in wardrobe and the other with an ensuite to match the family bathroom and second toilet. Ducted heating and a split system air conditioner take care of the comfort and outside the front courtyard is completely usable and out the back there's a grass free courtyard with covered patio and gate access to the rear set double carport. Freshly painted, immaculately presented, this home is ready for you to move in.
FOR SALE
Contact James Tan 0450 351 706
jamestan@melbournec21.com.au

Description:
A CLASSIC 3 BEDROOM WEATHERBOARD HOME IN GREAT CONDITION
Everyone loves the timeless look of a weatherboard home, and this example, on approximately 610sqm has been beautifully maintained throughout its life and offers its new owner the chance to either rent it out as it stands, move in and be instantly comfortable, or explore its potential for redevelopment as either a luxurious new home or 2 units (STCA).
Its yellow painted façade and mature trees in the front garden give it distinct appeal while inside you find polished hardwood floors and 9ft ceilings throughout much of the home. Features include a formal lounge with gas heater, a large kitchen with upright oven/stove and a living area that steps out to the covered deck.
There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as a family bathroom, separate toilet and a big laundry. Outside, the backyard is spacious and car lovers will certainly appreciate the oversized carport and the tandem garage that could double as a workshop. Backing onto the impressive Namatjira Park the home is also close to buses, 2 primary schools and is just minutes away from central Clayton and its buses, trains, shops and medical district.
Insights: 12 Bond Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle And Location Into One
Perfect for that first step out of home or to add to your investment portfolio is this low maintenance, brick veneer, neat and tidy town residence accommodating for every ones needs within walking distance Train Station and close schools, IKEA, shops and only minutes away to central Clayton. Monash University, and Monash Medical Centre, you couldn't ask for a better potential growth location.
Lovingly cared for, this handsome unit with own frontage features 2 large bedrooms with BIR's, spacious lounge area, central tiled bathroom with separate toilet, fully renovated kitchen plus meals area, brand new air conditioning in living area, polished floorboards, single lock-up garage plus extra car space.
Don't miss your chance and inspect today!!

Stylishly fully renovated 3 Bedroom on approx. 400m2 land in a fantastic location!
How good is this superbly presented, quality single storey residence in prime location, boasting open living area, spacious bedrooms and exceptional privacy on a quiet street. Within walking distance to Clayton Shopping Centre, Bus stops, Clayton train station, Monash Medical Centre and a short drive to Monash University, and Chadstone shopping centre.
As you walk into this superbly renovated home, the property's floorplan consists of three spacious bedrooms, building robes to Master, two pack kitchen, Stone bench tops, 900 stainless-steel appliances and much more.
Land size approx 400m2, high ceilings, floor to ceiling tiles, brand new double carport and a low maintenance private courtyard.This purchase is equally suited to owner occupiers or investors, within blue chip location and potential capital growth ahead.

Don't Miss This Opportunity
This well presented three-bedroom unit offers something for everyone which appeals to first home buyers, investors and downsizers alike.

It offers easy access to the train station, buses, shops and a host of schools including Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary, St Peter's school as well as Monash Hospital and University.

Don't miss this opportunity!

Description:
Easy, Contemporary Living In A Lifestyle Locale
With contemporary style and low maintenance ease, this modern streetfront townhouse offers a brilliant opportunity to first home buyers, young families or those looking for enticing investment rewards. Impeccably presented throughout, a light-well courtyard filters stunning natural light to a dual-zoned layout, where a versatile family room flows through to smart open plan living/dining, spacious kitchen and covered alfresco - the perfect backdrop for outdoor entertaining. Optimum space is heightened by 3 robed bedrooms (main with ensuite/WIR) and stylish bathroom, whilst a study nook, powder room, under stair storage, laundry chute, electric panel heating, spit system AC, NBN, water tank, SLUG with internal access and car space complete an ideal lifestyle package. Conveniently located just moments to Westall and Clayton Stations, local shops, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Description:
Owner Says Sell!! Offers Invited! Under Contract
This large 84m2 approx. 2 bedroom apartment, close to train station, will impress the most discerning of buyers. With quality fixtures and fittings, this home is approx. 5 years old and boasts: 2 bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite, large living, dining, tiles to all wet areas, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. The contemporary bathroom is a real WOW, with European style laundry included and balcony for those warm balmy nights to relax on. Other features include: air-conditioning, heating and undercover car space on title. With high rental returns achievable and in such a convenient location, this is surely an opportunity not be be missed, to live in or invest.

Description:
Modern Family Lifestyle in Convenient Location
Only two on the block, nestled in a high demand street is this 4 bedroom town home just over 1 year young. Scaled for the fast pace lifestyle or for one lucky family to appreciate and enjoy. Walking distance to Westall Train Station, First Street Reserve, Westall Secondary College and Westall Primary School, minutes' drive to Monash Medical Centre, Medical Clinics, Clayton Train Station, Monash University, Clayton Shopping Centre and mouth-watering restaurants, bus stops and so much more that are right at hand.
This home is flawlessly defined with timber hardwood floorboards flowing seamlessly throughout the home, with dining and lounge areas opening to beautiful green garden, a modern kitchen with granite bench top, glass splash back, tu-pac kitchen with soft close draws, dishwasher and Blanco appliances. Master bedroom is located downstairs including FES and WIR, other three bedrooms located upstairs, all with BIRs and Split A/Cs, central bathroom detailed with tiles to the ceiling and stone bench. Other features include: a total of 5 X Split A/Cs, one in the lounge and other 4 in the bedrooms, 2.7m high ceiling downstairs, powder and laundry rooms, tiles to wet areas, LED downlights all around, double glazed windows and internal access from remote controlled double garage.
Finally your dream is here! Have the lifestyle you desire, the home you want, in the location you seek.
PLEASE NOTE:
- All enquiries MUST include a contact telephone number
- Photo ID Required for all Inspections
Insights: 2/15 Third Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Owners Are Relocating!
Impressive options with endless advantages, this significant corner allotment of 674m2 (approx) invites a huge array of opportunity. Currently occupied by a 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home, it features living/meals area, kitchen and split system heating/AC. To the rear, oversized gates allow access to a large reinforced concrete yard, with carport, workshop and sheds connected with heavy duty power, ideal for trucks, boats or caravans. Capitalise on the priceless combination of dual frontages which are as rare as they come and much sought after. Situated within walking distance to Clayton shopping centre, Keeley Park reserve, bus routes, both Clayton Station and Westall station and the Monash Medical Centre.
16 Alward avenue (Two doors down- corner allotment with similar land size & configuration) are just finishing the construction of 3 double story townhouses which may be an option to take (S.T.C.A) or knock down and build your dream home.
Recent resales of 3 bedroom townhouses are in the area of $800,000-$850,000.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.
